channel.title: The Daily Pratchett
channel.description: A quote from Sir Terry Pratchett every day.

item.title: 16-Feb-17
item.description:
"- "Outside! What's it like?" - "Well -- It's sort of big""

- Terry Pratchett, Truckers

item.title: 15-Feb-17
item.description:
"Greebo could, in fact, commit sexual harrassment simply by sitting very quietly in the next room."

- Terry Pratchett, Maskerade

item.title: 14-Feb-17
item.description:
""What's a philosopher ?" said Brutha. "Someone who's bright enough to find a job with no heavy lifting," said a voice in his head."

- Terry Pratchett, Small Gods

item.title: 13-Feb-17
item.description:
"I thought jet planes were just trucks with more wings and less wheels."

- Terry Pratchett, Wings

item.title: 12-Feb-17
item.description:
"Thud. Thud. Thud. Splat."

- Terry Pratchett & Neil Gaiman, Good Omens
